metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon International Operations Risks
Amazon's international activities are significant to Amazon's revenues and profits.
Amazon plans to further expand internationally.
In certain international market segments, Amazon has relatively little operating experience.
Amazon may not benefit from any first-to-market advantages in certain international market segments.
Amazon may not otherwise succeed in certain international market segments.
It is costly to establish international operations.
It is costly to develop international operations.
It is costly to maintain international operations and stores.
It is costly to promote Amazon's brand internationally.
Amazon's international operations may not become profitable on a sustained basis.
Amazon's international sales are subject to local economic conditions.
Amazon's international operations are subject to local economic conditions.
Amazon's international sales are subject to local political conditions.
Amazon's international operations are subject to local political conditions.
Amazon's international sales are subject to government regulation of Amazon's product offerings.
Amazon's international operations are subject to government regulation of Amazon's product offerings.
Amazon's international sales are subject to government regulation of Amazon's service offerings.
Amazon's international operations are subject to government regulation of Amazon's service offerings.
Amazon's international sales are subject to government regulation of competition.
Amazon's international operations are subject to government regulation of competition.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictive governmental actions such as trade protection measures.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictive governmental actions such as trade protection measures.
Amazon's international sales are subject to export duties.
Amazon's international operations are subject to export duties.
Amazon's international sales are subject to quotas.
Amazon's international operations are subject to quotas.
Amazon's international sales are subject to custom duties and tariffs.
Amazon's international operations are subject to custom duties and tariffs.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions around the import of certain products.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions around the import of certain products.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions around the export of certain products.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions around the export of certain products.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions around the import of certain technologies.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions around the import of certain technologies.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions around the export of certain technologies.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions around the export of certain technologies.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions around the import of certain components.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions around the import of certain components.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions around the export of certain components.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions around the export of certain components.
Amazon's international sales are subject to nationalization.
Amazon's international operations are subject to nationalization.
Amazon's international sales are subject to restrictions on foreign ownership.
Amazon's international operations are subject to restrictions on foreign ownership.
